name: Lezzoo
headline: Lezzoo is an on-demand delivery Superapp for Iraq.

founders.name: Yadgar Merani, Founder
founders.description: I'm a Kurdish Iraqi, born in London and moved to Iraq at age 3. My journey in the startup world began in Iraq, where I founded a startup that was the first in the country to receive support from Y Combinator. Passionate about innovation and startups, I'm dedicated to making a positive impact through my work

#  We deliver happiness ‍to your doorstep. 
The region's leading super app, by your side everyday 
Download Now
![](https://lezzoo.com/images/doodle2.svg)![](https://lezzoo.com/images/doodle1.svg)
### Why Choose Us?
##  Here are a few reasons why we can be friends! 
[ 01 For Consumers ](https://lezzoo.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>) [ 02 For Merchants ](https://lezzoo.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>) [ 03 For Riders ](https://lezzoo.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
![](https://lezzoo.com/images/egrs.png)
## We deliver, you enjoy!
Experience a world of convenience like never before, where everything you need is just a few taps away. From delicious meals to essential services, we're here to simplify your life. 

Enjoy effortless ordering and quick deliveries. 

Access a wide range of services at your fingertips. 

Trust in a user-friendly, reliable superapp for all your needs. 
Let's be friends!
![](https://lezzoo.com/images/dtgyj.png)
## Let the world enjoy your flavors
Partner with us to unlock new opportunities and elevate your business. Together, we can expand your reach, boost sales, and thrive in the digital age. 

Expand your customer base with our extensive user network. 

Boost sales through a seamless and efficient platform. 

Benefit from our commitment to supporting your growth. 
[Become a Merchant with us](https://lezzoo.com/<https:/join.lezzoo.com>)
![](https://lezzoo.com/images/egrsj.png)
## Join our Family
Join our dynamic delivery network and embark on a journey of flexibility and earnings. We value your dedication and offer a steady stream of opportunities for you to thrive. 

Earn flexibly and conveniently with our rider-friendly app. 

Access a steady stream of delivery opportunities. 

Be part of a community that values your hard work. 
[Become a Lezzoo Rider](https://lezzoo.com/<https:/driver.lezzoo.com>)
### What We Do?
##  We offer a hand in everything you need 
We make your lives easier, so you can focus on what's important: being you! 
Try Lezzoo Today!
![](https://lezzoo.com/images/Group-8-2.png)
### Food Delivery
Satisfy your cravings with our seamless food delivery and pickup options. 
![](https://lezzoo.com/images/Group-9-2.png)
### Groceries
Stock up on essentials with hassle-free grocery ordering & delivery. 
![](https://lezzoo.com/images/Group-7-1-2.png)
### Services
From repairs to renovations, find trusted professionals for all your home service needs. 
![](https://lezzoo.com/images/Group-10-2-1.png)
### Express
Need it delivered fast? Our express courier service has got you covered. 
![](https://lezzoo.com/images/Group-6-2.png)
### Pharmacy
Get your prescriptions delivered right to your doorstep with our pharmacy service. 
![](https://lezzoo.com/images/Group-11-2.png)
### E-commerce
Shop your favorite products from top e-commerce stores through our super app. 
![](https://lezzoo.com/images/dgfdghj.png)
### Customer Satisfaction
#  We make your life stress-free and we guarantee you will love us 
At Lezzoo, we're on a mission to make your life stress-free, and your satisfaction is our top priority. We're committed to continuous improvement and work every day to refine and enhance our services to ensure you experience nothing but the best. Your feedback drives us forward, shaping the future of a hassle-free, worry-free life with Lezzoo. 
#### 4.8
##### Customer Satisfaction

generated_description:
Lezzoo is a pioneering on-demand delivery super app based in Erbil, Iraq, and it's here to revolutionize how people get their goods and services. Founded in 2018 and part of the Y Combinator Batch W19, Lezzoo has quickly become a heavyweight in Iraq's digital marketplace.

At its core, Lezzoo aims to make life easier, delivering everything from food to groceries and household services directly to your doorstep with just a few taps on your device. The motto is simple: "We deliver happiness to your doorstep." This isn’t just a flashy slogan; it reflects Lezzoo's commitment to customer satisfaction, evidenced by a noteworthy 4.8-star rating from users.

With a robust team of around 190 employees, Lezzoo is powered by a diverse workforce dedicated to enhancing the user experience. Their services include food delivery, grocery shopping, pharmacy needs, e-commerce, and even courier services for faster delivery options. They've thought through the convenience factor, offering multiple subscription plans, like the Lezzoo VIP, which provides perks such as free deliveries and exclusive discounts.

Lezzoo sets itself apart in the market by being a one-stop-shop. It's not just about delivering food; it's about fostering a community that connects consumers, merchants, and riders in an efficient ecosystem. If you're a merchant, they promise to help grow your business by tapping into Lezzoo's extensive user network.

Their emphasis on innovation, creativity, and top-notch customer support reflects a deep understanding of the local market and consumer needs. Plus, with Michael Seibel from Y Combinator backing them, they’re poised for future growth and increased visibility.

In a world where convenience is key, Lezzoo isn't just another delivery service—it's a lifestyle enhancement for the people of Iraq. If you're in the region, checking out Lezzoo could save you time and add a bit of joy to your daily routine. You can find out more and explore their offerings at [lezzoo.com](https://lezzoo.com).
